venue.address_1: Between Church, Elm, Temple and Chapel streets
venue.name: Lower New Haven Green

item.description:
Summer is here and that means New Haven is again hosting a series of free concerts on the green. I hope you'll join me for the first of the series as the New Haven Symphony Orchestra performs a concert titled American Earth.

Bring a chair/blanket, bring some beer/wine, bring your ability to enjoy free music while sitting outdoors with friends.

I'll be heading to the green around 5pm to stake out a place for my blanket and start enjoying my crackers with cheese and wine. I can't say for sure where I'll be sitting yet, but if you can't find me give me a call.

Contact: Jeanie (203) 494-3518
item.name: Symphony on the Green
